metadata.name: Event Card
metadata.description: Card component for displaying event information with date, location, and details. Features image display, event metadata, and flexible content areas.
metadata.author: CivicTheme

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Theme variation controlling the visual appearance

image.title: Event Image
image.description: Optional event image with URL and alt text

url.title: Image URL
url.description: URL path to the event image

alt.title: Alt Text
alt.description: Alternative text for the image (required for accessibility)

date_iso.title: ISO Start Date
date_iso.description: Event start date and time in ISO 8601 format for machine readability

date.title: Display Date
date.description: Human-readable event start date and time

date_end_iso.title: ISO End Date
date_end_iso.description: Event end date and time in ISO 8601 format for machine readability

date_end.title: Display End Date
date_end.description: Human-readable event end date and time

link.title: Event Link
link.description: Optional link to the full event details page

url.title: Link URL
url.description: URL to the event details page

is_new_window.title: Open in New Window
is_new_window.description: Whether to open the link in a new window/tab

tags.title: Event Tags
tags.description: Array of tags associated with the event for categorization

url.title: Tag URL
url.description: Optional URL for the tag to link to filtered results

is_new_window.title: Open in New Window
is_new_window.description: Whether to open tag link in new window

attributes.title: HTML Attributes
attributes.description: Additional HTML attributes to apply to the root element

modifier_class.title: Modifier Classes
modifier_class.description: Additional CSS classes for styling variations

examples.title: Event name which runs across two or three lines
examples.summary: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

image_over.title: Image Overlay
image_over.description: Content to overlay on top of the event image (badges, labels, etc.)

content_top.title: Top Content Area
content_top.description: Content area at the top of the card content section

content_middle.title: Middle Content Area
content_middle.description: Content area between title and location for additional details

summary.title: Event Summary
summary.description: Brief description or summary of the event
examples: Join us for an interactive workshop on modern web development techniques.

content_bottom.title: Bottom Content Area
content_bottom.description: Content area at the bottom of the card for additional information

requirements: Image alt text must be provided for all images
Event dates should include both human-readable and ISO formats
Links should have appropriate focus states
Calendar icon provides semantic meaning for date information

performance.loading: Images should use appropriate loading strategies
performance.optimization: Consider lazy loading for images below the fold

guidelines: Use for displaying event information in lists or grids
Include essential event details: date, title, location
Provide clear, descriptive alt text for event images
Use consistent date formatting across events

examples.title: Basic Event Card
examples.description: Simple event with date, title, and link
examples.code: {% include 'civictheme:event-card' with { theme: 'light', date: '20 Jan 2023 11:00', title: 'Community Workshop', link: { url: '/events/123' } } only %}

examples.title: Full Event Card
examples.description: Complete event with image, dates, location, and tags
examples.code: {% include 'civictheme:event-card' with { theme: 'light', image: { url: '/image.jpg', alt: 'Workshop photo' }, date: '20 Jan 2023 11:00', date_end: '20 Jan 2023 15:00', title: 'Annual Conference', location: 'Convention Centre', summary: 'Join us for our annual conference.', tags: ['Conference', 'Annual'] } only %}

best_practices: Always provide alt text for event images
Use semantic date formats with ISO alternatives
Keep event titles concise but descriptive
Include location information for physical events
Use tags to help users find related events

extraction.notes: Complete component analysis with all props, slots, and styling information extracted from source files
